title: When did you join Avicus?

replies.body: I joined April 10, 2013 on an account named skipp18. I used the ip: "wallsmc.com". I mainly played SG or Walls.

replies.body: I was your average public player in McZone then left and rejoined at which point it was Avicus on December 4th 2013, but never began to become part of the community until a year later, two months later I was Junior Moderator. c;
